function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Slowdown or stoppage of developments due to financial constraints","Impact":"Lack of progress in construction projects, potential job losses for contractors","Mitigation":"Additional financial aids, incentives, and support from the government","Technologies":"N/A","People":"Contractors, construction companies, laborers","Owner":"Government, industry associations"},{"Description":"High level of debt and low cash reserves for construction companies","Impact":"Liquidity crisis, inability to repay loans, financial instability","Mitigation":"Government intervention, financial support, debt restructuring","Technologies":"N/A","People":"Construction companies, financial institutions","Owner":"Government, financial institutions"},{"Description":"Labor shortage and material supply chain disruptions","Impact":"Delays in project completion, increased costs, potential labor issues","Mitigation":"Ensuring sufficient site labor, quick resumption of material supply chain","Technologies":"N/A","People":"Contractors, laborers, material suppliers","Owner":"Government"}]}
